title: Thailand Government Budget Value
description: Thailand recorded a government budget surplus of 130338 THB Million in September of 2022. Government Budget Value in Thailand averaged 1806.60 THB Million from 1987 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 217720 THB Million in June of 2012 and a record low of -258195 THB Million in October of 2016. The government budget balance is the difference between government revenues and expenses. The budget is balanced when outlays equal to receipts, the country reports budget surplus when revenues are higher than expenses and deficit when expenses exceed the revenues. This page provides - Thailand Government Budget Value - actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: Bank Of Thailand
